article_title: $108M Analytics Outsourcing Deal Puts Health Catalyst At Risk For Allina Health Outcomes

article_metadata.author: Neil Versel

og.description: A major Minnesota health system is outsourcing its entire analytics operation in a 10-year, $108 million deal with a twist: The technology vendor has a financial incentive to assure that Minneapolis-based Allina Health actually improves patient outcomes and reduces the cost of care. Under the terms of the contract, announced Tuesday, [...]
